name: iOS 16.3.1 and iPadOS 16.3.1
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi of Pangu Lab, Ned Williamson of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted certificate may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A denial-of-service issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.
